bug.short_desc: broken dependency for python-oslo-messaging in Fedora 26
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext: python-oslo-messaging-5.17.1-1.fc26 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 26. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-42a589a868

Proposed as a Freeze Exception for 26-final by Fedora user till using the blocker tracking app because:
This fixes a broken dependency in Fedora 26

What is broken/fixed?
We have bad python3 deps https://taskotron.fedoraproject.org/artifacts/all/9340b2da-528b-11e7-b258-5254008e42f6/task_output/output.log
I'll fix that now.

The problem is this broken dependency:
[python-oslo-messaging] python3-oslo-messaging-5.10.0-1.fc26.noarch requires python(abi) = 0:3.5 python3-oslo-messaging-tests-5.10.0-1.fc26.noarch requires python(abi) = 0:3.5
It is currently broken in F26 because (AFAICS) https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-42a589a868 is not in stable yet. Since we are now in the Final Freeze a Freeze Exception is needed to get the update in stable. For a Freeze Exception a bug is needed. Therefore I filed the bug and asked for a Freeze Exception so I do not have to retire the package to clean up the final F26 release.
python-oslo-messaging-5.17.1-2.fc26 python-oslo-utils-3.22.0-1.fc26 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 26. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-42a589a868

Here is full dnf repoquery --whatrequires "python(abi) = 0:3.5" on f26: python3-bsddb3-0:6.2.4-2.fc26.x86_64 python3-django-admin-honeypot-0:1.0.0-1.fc26.noarch python3-oslo-messaging-0:5.10.0-1.fc26.noarch python3-oslo-messaging-tests-0:5.10.0-1.fc26.noarch python3-oslo-middleware-0:3.19.0-1.fc26.noarch python3-oslo-middleware-tests-0:3.19.0-1.fc26.noarch python3-oslo-versionedobjects-0:1.8.0-1.fc26.noarch python3-oslo-versionedobjects-tests-0:1.8.0-1.fc26.noarch
oslo-messaging is fixed by https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-42a589a868 oslo-middleware by https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-a047ea02c9 oslo-versionedobjects by https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-b93677bf00

python-oslo-messaging-5.17.1-2.fc26, python-oslo-utils-3.22.0-1.fc26 has been pushed to the Fedora 26 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-42a589a868

Discussed at 2017-06-29 freeze exception review meeting: https://meetbot-raw.fedoraproject.org/fedora-blocker-review/2017-06-29/f26-blocker-review.2017-06-29-16.00.html . We agreed that in principle we'll accept all the many 'broken dependency' bugs as FEs, but we will be checking each update carefully to make sure it doesn't introduce any other problems before we push it.
python-oslo-messaging-5.17.1-2.fc26, python-oslo-utils-3.22.0-1.fc26 has been pushed to the Fedora 26 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
